item.description:
God gave us intelligence, life, strength, health, feelings, and creativity. God gave us the Light by which to see, the energy to get things done, and the ability to Love. Devotion is this Love expressing from our hearts. Devotion is acknowledging that God is the Divine Source and Power behind everything. Join us for this seminar - a discussion and experience of what it truly means to live a life filled with Devotion and Love.
(light lunch included)

This seminar is being given by Mother Clare Watts. Mother Clare is the Co-Director of the Order of Christ Sophia, a Master Teacher, ordained Priest, midwife, marriage and family therapist, nationally renowned speaker, and author of "Giving Birth to God: A Woman's Path to Enlightenment".

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Seminar - Devotion: The True Path to God
